```py
>>> import numpy.ma as ma
>>> a = ma.arange(3)
>>> a[1] = ma.masked
>>> b = ma.arange(2, 5)
>>> a
masked_array(data=[0, --, 2],
 mask=[False,  True, False],
 fill_value=999999)
>>> b
masked_array(data=[2, 3, 4],
 mask=False,
 fill_value=999999)
>>> ma.concatenate([a, b])
masked_array(data=[0, --, 2, 2, 3, 4],
 mask=[False,  True, False, False, False, False],
 fill_value=999999) 
```
